nodes.text: Survive The Rryatt Trail was a decorative poster available in the galaxy sometime after the Battle of Yavin, which took place during the Galactic Civil War, a conflict between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The poster depicted the Shadowlands, the sun deprived surface of the planet Kashyyyk at the end of the Rryatt Trail, along with a katarn, a native species of predators, in the background. A minstyngar, another native predator, appeared in the left foreground of the poster along with Aurebesh text, the Galactic Basic Standard alphabet, spelling out the name of the poster along the top and right.

Survive The Rryatt Trail appeared in the 2003 MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies developed by Sony Online Entertainment and published by LucasArts. It was one of three "chapter gifts" given out randomly to every player that logged in during the release of Chapter 1: The Corellian Captives on June 8, 2006. The player would receive a "rolled up poster" item upon logging in and when used, would randomly award you one of the three posters. The other posters of the three were Mystic Corellia and It Came From Mustafar!. The player could use the poster as decoration in their house.
